name: Time Beast (Frozentape)
description:
A hapless detective faces off against a time-bending entity which flings him from his 1970s office to the worst place imaginable - the year 2020.

Raccoon Toast Productions is Lisa Braun, Duncan Gallagher, Nick Harbourne, and Jim Harbourne.

Created by  for Brackey's Game Jam 2020.2.
